title: No content returned for URL when no webapps deployed instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance without any webapps deployed and accessing a URL, a HTTP code 200 OK with no content is returned instead of an expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When accessing a URL of a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it returns a HTTP code 200 OK with no content.
EB: When accessing a URL of a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, it should return a HTTP error 404.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL of the Tomcat 7 instance
Expected result: HTTP error 404 is returned
Actual result: HTTP code 200 OK with no content is returned
